biotools.summary: Genome-wide Reconstruction of Complex Structural Variants (GROC-SVs) is a software pipeline for identifying large-scale structural variants, performing sequence assembly at the breakpoints, and reconstructing the complex structural variants using the long-fragment information from the 10x Genomics platform.

bioschemas.name: GROC-SVs
bioschemas.summary: Genome-wide Reconstruction of Complex Structural Variants (GROC-SVs) is a software pipeline for identifying large-scale structural variants, performing sequence assembly at the breakpoints, and reconstructing the complex structural variants using the long-fragment information from the 10x Genomics platform.
